title: How to Play YouTube Music in the Background on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open the YouTube Music app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the YouTube Music app on your iPhone or iPad. The YT Music icon looks like a red circle with a white Play button in the middle. You can find it on your home screen.

steps.title: Start playing a song.
steps.content: Start playing a song. Find and tap the song you want to hear. This will start playing it in the YT Music app.

steps.title: Press your iPhone or iPad's Home button.
steps.content: Press your iPhone or iPad's Home button. This is the circle button at the bottom of your iPhone's front side. It will take you to your home screen, and your music will keep playing in the background. If you're using an iPhone X, swipe up from the bottom of your screen to quit the app. If you don't have a Premium membership, your music will stop as soon as you switch out of the YT Music app.

steps.title: Press your iPhone or iPad's lock button.
steps.content: Press your iPhone or iPad's lock button. This will turn off your screen. Your music will keep playing in the background. Like background play, this feature also requires a Premium membership. If you don't have a YouTube Music Premium subscription, your music will stop when you turn off your screen.
